## Toolbox.shouldDeselectItem\_() method

Decides whether the old item should be deselected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected shouldDeselectItem_(oldItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null, newItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  oldItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md) \| null | The previously selected toolbox item. |
|  newItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md) \| null | The newly selected toolbox item. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the old item should be deselected, false otherwise.
